articles.description: The nonfiction book is said to combine "film criticism, film theory, a feat of reporting, and wonderful personal history."
articles.content: Quentin Tarantino still has not announced any plans to shoot his final movie, but cinephiles can look forward to some new work from the “Pulp Fiction” director this fall. Tarantino is writing a new b… [+2595 chars]

articles.title: MOVIE POLL: What Is Your Favorite Tom Cruise Movie? - JoBlo.com
articles.description: With the release of Top Gun: Maverick this weekend, we're asking you to pick your favorite Tom Cruise movie.
